headline: Is Exelon Attractively Priced After Its Recent 5% Pullback in 2025?
summary: Curious if Exelon is a bargain right now? Whether you’re on the hunt for value or just making sense of its latest moves, you’re in the right place. Exelon's price has soared 20.6% year-to-date with a 19.7% gain over the last year and an even more impressive 80.0% return over five years. However, the last month has seen a 5.4% pullback. Much of this action comes as investors responded to the company’s sector positioning and regulatory updates, which injected fresh energy and renewed optimism...

headline: Data Center Politics Get Messy. Billions in Tech Investments Are on the Line.
summary: The nation’s biggest economic engine—artificial intelligence—is linked to one of its biggest economic anxieties—rising electricity prices.  AI data centers use so much electricity that they’re causing prices to rise for nearby communities.  Nowhere was that tension more evident this week than at a meeting on data centers by PJM, the nation’s largest electricity grid operator.
